title: Ayurvedic Breathwork Guide + Audio (Digital Download)
excerpt: Downloadable pranayama audio and PDF guide with beginner-to-intermediate breath routines and a printable cheat-sheet.
content:
## What Is This Digital Product?
A downloadable package containing guided pranayama audio tracks (10–30 minutes) and a PDF guide/cheat-sheet with step-by-step breathing practices suitable for beginners and intermediate practitioners.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Breath (prana) is central to Ayurveda. Guided pranayama supports respiratory strength, mental clarity, and immune resilience when practiced regularly.

### Key Benefits
- Improves breathing capacity and focus.
- Calms the nervous system and supports immunity.
- Convenient audio-led sessions to practice at home.

## Ingredients
- Digital audio files (MP3)
- Printable PDF guide and cheat-sheet

## Usage Instructions
- Practice 10–30 minutes daily depending on routine. Follow guidance in the PDF for safety and progression.

## Packaging
- Digital download link provided after purchase; printable bonus cheat-sheet included.

## Safety & Consultation
- Those with respiratory conditions, heart conditions, or pregnant women should consult a clinician before advanced breathwork. Start gently and follow the guided levels.

## Why Choose This Guide?
A practical, structured way to build a daily pranayama habit with audio support and clear instructions.
